channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiSwitch
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiSwitch

item.title: CVE-2021-26111|2024-08-03T20:19:20.121Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortiswitch
item.description: A missing release of memory after effective lifetime vulnerability in FortiSwitch 6.4.0 to 6.4.6, 6.2.0 to 6.2.6, 6.0.0 to 6.0.6, 3.6.11 and below may allow an attacker on an adjacent network to exhaust available memory by sending specifically crafted LLDP/CDP/EDP packets to the device.
